thread.title: Lorna Anderson
thread.title_full: Vacation Rental Pros reviewed by Lorna Anderson

author: Lorna Anderson
title: Lorna Anderson
text: My family has used Vacation Rental Pros to find our Florida vacation home for the past 6 years. We have never had any issues. Their customer service is excellent. One year we had chosen our rental home and about halfway thru the contract, he house was no longer being rented. Vacation Rental Pros made sure I have a replacement house with the same amenities and within my budget. They went above in my opinion. That's why I keep coming back
